name: UC - Auto Numeric
description: Free Plug-in under MIT License, which means it is free for everyone to use, no matter if for commercial or private use. Plug-ins Pro UC AutoNumeric is an Oracle APEX plug-in designed to enhance the look of any application by formatting numbers into your desired formats and currencies. In addition to formatting, the UC AutoNumeric plug-in also supports the coloring of text or number fields which improves your user's experience. The plug-in is built on top of the AutoNumeric.js library and uses NLS settings to detect database settings for ., or .,.
